name: Bionic Commando: Re-Armed
description: Classic side-scrolling action is reporting back for duty on mobile! Revisit the new look arcade hit, swinging and shooting your way to save the world!

name: Metal Thunder
description: Command the legendary gunship in a high-octane action-roguelite! Engage insurgents with devastating firepower in ever-changing missions. Upgrade your arsenal, adapt to dynamic challenges, and survive relentless waves of enemies. Every run offers new tactics and chaos as you dominate the skies.

name: Across the Wonderlands
description:
A whimsical open-world survival crafting game!
Build your magical base dimension and craft fun dishes to fight quirky foes on your journey to the fallen star.

name: Virus Alert 3D
description: "Weird Al" Yankovic is finally starring in his own video game - VIRUS ALERT! - based on the song from his latest album, Straight Outta Lynwood. It's more fun than a warehouse full of pink leotards! Hoards of viruses have spread throughout the computer network of Company-Tech Co., Ltd., LCC, Al's new employer. Help Al advance in his job by "deleting" the viruses and protecting machines from the spreading menace with antiviral CDs.

name: RagnaTales MMORPG
description: RagnaTales is a community-driven MMORPG that brings the classic experience of old-mmos to life with modern updates and new gameplay features. Players can explore vibrant landscapes, engage in epic battles, and experience nostalgic adventures, all while participating in dynamic group activities and large-scale events. With customized quests, unique server events, and balanced classes, RagnaTales offers both seasoned players and newcomers a refreshing take on their amazing universe!

name: Nature Escapes 4: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The 7th Guest
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle For Vera
description: Battle for Vera is a Real-Time Strategy game that draws inspiration from beloved classics, and improves upon many of their ideas to create an exciting new experience.

name: The Bodycam Project
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursed Feed
description:
In first-person horror game "Cursed Feed," players embark on a chilling journey with the Thornvale family as they confront a malevolent force unleashed by their own patriarch's archaeological discoveries.

Richard Thornvale, a renowned archaeologist, returns from a harrowing expedition in the Middle East with cryptic artifacts in tow, he unwittingly invites an ancient curse into their tranquil home. Soon, inexplicable phenomena plague the household, and Emily, their young daughter, becomes the focal point of the sinister presence.

With each passing night, the family is tormented by terrifying apparitions and escalating paranormal activity, leading them to unravel dark secrets buried within the walls of their own home.

As they delve deeper into the mystery, they must confront their own fears and uncover the truth behind the curse before it consumes them all. Will they break free from the grip of the past, or will they become mere echoes in the haunted halls of their own history?

name: Circle Triangle Cross
description: Sin descripción

name: Chronos Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Chained Climb Together
description: Balance between you and your partner, survive together! One chain - one life, prove your ability to cooperate!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Lucky Dragon
description: The 11th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings the Mulan Realm to the game (inspired by 1998's Mulan), the new characters Mulan and Mushu, the Majesty and Magnolias Star Path, a new event called Memory Mania and a new feature of cooking delivery daily quests by Remy.

name: Summoner
description: Summoners have toppled empires and challenged gods. They are venerated as saviours and feared as destroyers. With rings crafted by the ancient Khosani, the gifted can call forth demons, dragons, and elementals, but only the strongest can control the forces they unleash.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Dapper Delights
description: The 12th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings Tiana (from Disney's Princess and the Frog) to the Valley, a new restaurant building, a new Stall for buying prepared meals, the Dapper Delights Star Path and general quality of life improvements.

name: IWWHIIWWHITOMIROTPG: The Game!
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Jungle Getaway
description: The 13th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings a new day-night cycle to The Lion King Realm, the new characters The Night Show Star Path and the return of the Halloween seasonal event Trick or Treat.

name: Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG
description: Dive deep into a vibrant underwater world in Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG! Embark on an epic adventure as a small fish with a big destiny. Explore stunning coral reefs, vast oceans, and winding rivers as you evolve into a powerful and majestic creature.

name: Endless Empty
description: Sci-fi horror about a controversial company that removes the world's trash.

name: Human Fall Flat VR
description: Experience the blockbuster physics platformer, now in VR! Explore an imaginative world of floating dreamscapes with an all-new control method, providing direct control of each of your Human’s arms.

name: NGE: VR
description: Neon Genesis Evangelion for PCVR

name: Wolf Fang
description: Sin descripción

name: Skull Fang
description: Sin descripción

name: Uno Wonder
description: Set sail on a luxurious global cruise, travel the world, visit iconic landmarks, and make new friends along the way.

name: Lilian Fourhand: Nuclear Soeur the Fighters
description: Lilian Fourhand is a side scrolling action game that uses characters and locations from Maria-sama ga Miteru. Players move from left to right shooting down all enemies that come along, ranging from the likes of birds and bugs to schoolgirls.

name: Formless Mother
description: Formless Mother is set of 5 MBF21 maps set in a dark, very red, atmosphere heavily inspired by the work of Suguru Tanaka.

name: Blob-Y
description: Play as Blob-Y, a sentient blob yearning for freedom. Push the testing facility to its limit as you overcome mind-bending levels. Discover how to combine mechanics in creative ways to outsmart your creators in this challenging puzzle game.

name: Climb Knight
description: Sin descripción

name: New Ghostbusters II Plus
description:
A rom hack of "New Ghostbusters II". After making a patch to recolor the Ghostbusters to allow Winston a more natural skin tone, many other alterations were made in an attempt to make an already great game even better.

Major changes:
- Ghostbusters recolored
- Improved Ghostbuster sprites (Proton packs, legs, Peter’s hairline, Egon’s glasses, etc…)
- Color palette tweaks to enemies and a few minor tweaks to level palettes
- Shrunk giant chair on character select screen
- Minor sprite/tile edits and fixes
- Added names to credits
- Vigo’s hair outlined, making it much more visible (no more bald Vigo)
- Improved Janosz’s sprite
- Major color palette tweaks on every level to create better contrast and compliment the new-colored ghostbusters
- Improved legs
- Color changes to character select (reverted) and level 2 (for variety)
- Few other minor tweaks

name: Ball Game
description: Welcome to ball game! Roll, bounce, and spin your way through a series of ball based obstacles and levels. Be careful not to fall too many times or take too long, but most importantly, have fun!

name: Anna's Summer Splash
description: The peaceful Dolpik Isles are under attack by the notorious Gooble gang. They have stolen the power of the sun metals and the only one that can stop them is Anna, a cheerful inventor who just had her and her brother's vacation ruined!

name: Scotophobia
description: Scotophobia is a psychological horror in which you're your accommodation is rapidly changing ceasing to belong to you. Will you be able to uphold your abode, reveal the origin of the mysterious guests, keep sanity, and… survive?

name: Hover Groove
description: A physics-based platformer about a drone looking for a way. You are hovering above the ground with electric beams. Your goal is to angle the thrusters to overcome increasingly difficult obstacles. The controls are difficult, but mastering them is all the more satisfying!

name: Blockdock
description: Move, rotate, and place blocks to fill platforms. Play against the clock, be accurate, or just relax with endless play in this Tetris-inspired game.

name: Reality Rifts
description: 3D platformer with a portal gun! Solve puzzles, exciting levels, become a master of portal travel.

name: Enemy On the Tail!
description: “Enemy on the Tail!” is a turn-based tactical dueling game about aerial combat. Choose your plane, use its unique traits, anticipate enemy moves, and attack! Or shake off enemies with clever maneuvers! Train against AI and compete with friends online. Ready for takeoff?

name: Project SJHG
description: The Journey to Restore the Distorted Time and Space

name: Conflux
description: A horror game where you can interact with your surroundings to find clues, fight monsters and solve puzzles as you uncover new areas in search for a mysterious artifact.

name: Motion Soccer
description: Motion Soccer immerses you in 11v11 matches that you'll experience in a whole new way thanks to Virtual Reality: control the game from an aerial view, play in first person with classic controls, or use real movement to control the player's feet. Get ready to dominate the field!

name: Harvest Master
description: A farm puzzle game that makes you want to repeat it over and over again to achieve a high score!

name: A Story About Birds
description: The birds are coming back! So, gather some wood, some bird food, and build some amazing shelters. Explore Plumage Farm on a relaxing day and get to know its inhabitants and regulars. How will you use the day?

name: From Hell
description: From Hell is a first-person psychological horror game that focuses on creating fear and tension for the player.

name: MatchOolu
description: A card matching game like no other. Test your memory. Test your dexterity. Explore your mind.

name: Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator
description: Unleash your strategic skills in Ninja Wars: Battle Simulator! Command your army of Swordsmen, Spearmen, and Archers in a stunning 3D world. Analyze enemy formations and develop tactics to lead your ninjas to victory.

name: Kung Pao Banqi
description: Kung Pao Banqi is a two-player game of chance played on half a xiangqi board. Play hot seat, against AI, or online and beat your opponents with luck and strategy!

name: Coffee Extra: Ukuzala
description: A mysterious board game that magically turns its players pregnant. Navigate through a spooky house and solve puzzles in order to beat the game and help the heroines escape unscathed.

name: The Dark Mind
description: Locked in Jessica's endless hallucinations. Carefully observe your surroundings to guide her back to reality. An Unreal Engine 5 short horror hidden object game.

name: Emberwake
description: A dark fantasy survival strategy game where you manage villagers, gather resources, and defend a burning campfire against waves of undead in a relentless battle for survival.

name: Escaping Darkness
description: Find your way out of an abandoned mansion, avoiding an evil entity set on hunting you as you escape through pitch black rooms. Scavenge for resources to keep the dark at bay and solve puzzles to move forward. Escaping Darkness is an escape room-based survival horror game designed for VR.

name: Cape Hideous
description: Amongst the motliest of all crews, an enigmatic woman prepares the ship to enter an intense thunderstorm that rages in the middle of the ocean. What otherworldly mysteries lie within?

name: Super Market
description: Super Market is a fun, silly game about shopping with superpowers, throwing items at friends, and racing to be the first to finish your shopping while the world around is gets crazier and crazier.

name: Mother's Home
description: Mother's Home is a psychological horror game. The player is left alone at home while their mother is taken to the hospital. Sarah soon finds out she is not alone, and her mother is back inside the house.

name: Cosmic Raze
description: Cosmic Raze is a sci-fi tower defense strategy game. Control advanced weapons, build powerful synergies, and then blast away as aliens attempt to conquer Earth. Between rounds you'll earn unique augmentations, purchase and upgrade a huge variety of weapons, and unlock powerful synergy bonuses.

name: Fall Platform
description: Fall Platform is a puzzle game that consists of climbing as high as possible until reaching the top without falling, no saving possible, the game wants to be the most difficult on the steam market. legend has it that those who manage to finish the game will have an IQ between 120 and 200.

name: Game About Jetpack Fly
description: This game about jetpack fly. Two thrusters. Two control buttons.

name: PlayGuys
description: Choose your skills, combine your equipment, match them with unexpected combinations and enjoy the joy of mowing grass. playgus is a survival-like game. Players will be free to take risks in a relaxed and pleasant style.

name: Mutant Crisis
description: If you like to fight zombies purely, and hope to have talents and attribute growth, be able to unlock epic weapons for free that previously required a recharge of $3888 in krypton gold games, and be able to cooperate with friends online to challenge BOSS, then don't miss this game.

name: Extreme Offroad Racing
description: Extreme Offroad Racing is a FREE all-terrain, off-road monster truck racing game featuring hundreds of race challenges. Get behind the wheel and buckle up for the most addictive and FUN physics-based driving experience!

name: Nowv
description: This game is inspired by Ningning, a member of the South Korean idol group aespa. It conveys the message that even one's flaws can become strengths through inner growth.

name: Doomsday Cleaner
description: In the game, you will play as a survivor, facing endless zombie threats. You need to use your weapons and intelligence to clean up every zombie, protect yourself, and find hope for survival.

name: New Journey to the West
description: "New Journey to the West" is a multiplayer RPG. Form a four-player team to defeat demons, explore poetic landscapes, and enjoy scenic beauty. The revolutionary aerial combat system allows you to enjoy smooth and graceful battles. Join this with friends!

name: 8alloween
description: Walking Simulator Inspired by the 8th exit, this game requires sound for identifying anomalies. Use speakers or headphones. Contains mild horror elements.

name: The Magic Garden
description: Welcome to a new fantasy world, where you start a new life in this realm. Explore the mysterious places of this world. Here, you can build farm, meet various characters.By farming, collecting items, and using items and skills, venture into dungeons to defeat monsters and collect rare items.

name: Tales of The White Knight
description: This is a new SRPG strategy role-playing game created by the WK-Studio. The game will feature beautiful graphics presented in a 3D top-down perspective. Set in the war-torn continent of Breskan, the protagonists will face many trials and tribulations, what will be their fate?

name: Wolfman
description: You are a wolfman hunter on a critical mission: to uncover the truth and prove that the werewolf is not just a legend, but a real and deadly threat. Your journey will bring you face to face with the beast, as you seek to end the nightmare once and for all.

name: Hidden Storehouse Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: The Parish
description: A slow and atmospheric retro horror game. These hills hide more than just this congregation. Tend this remote church, give services to the needy and you never know... you might just survive the night

name: CatClimber
description: Adventurous 2D platformer, Smash bricks and climb up the floors of the dungeon to find the treasures of the dragon

name: Nabi
description: Can you escape this abyss, a place of despair and evil? Pride, lust, greed, jealousy, indolence, gluttony, anger Defy their temptations!

name: Worst Case
description: Trapped in a mysterious hotel filled with dark secrets, you must survive the deadly puzzles of a sinister ghost with their loyal assistant. Choose your role: outwit the hunters as a survivor or haunt the intruders as the ghost. Every game brings new chills and challenges.

name: Delirium
description: Delirium is a psychological horror game set in a suburban house. After a mysterious explosion, reality begins to unravel.

name: Deep Despair 3
description: Deep Despair 3 is an open-world survival action-adventure with RPG elements! Fight, survive, dig, build, explore vast worlds, engage in farming, breed animals, gather resources, and level up to the max!

name: SCP: A Star Replicator
description: It's an action shooting game that combines the elements of survival and action RPG, Weapons are enhanced with different parts, skills are upgraded to remove SCP. It deals with the unique SCP of the SCP world view, and enjoy casual survival and combat.

name: Fox and Shadow
description: Fox and Shadow is a scifi dual deckbuilding roguelike. Scavenge for resources in a broken city to maintain your crumbling bunker. Create a deck that contains your Pilot's emotions with your Drone's logic to destroy defective robots for parts. The world is in ruins, salvage yourself.

name: Souls of Shadow
description: Souls of Shadow seamlessly blends deep role-playing elements with thrilling action combat, delivering an unparalleled adventure for players. Get ready to embrace the challenge, uncover the truth, and save this world engulfed in darkness!

name: Captain of Space
description: Become a Galactic LegendStart as a space captain with a small ship, mine asteroids, hunt pirates, and build your space empire. Upgrade your ship, hire crew, and conquer sectors. Your goal: become the most powerful in the galaxy!

name: Chaos Entropy
description: This RPG features a unique combat system! After obtaining the Chaos God's Ring, you must evade the Goddess's minions while exploring the world, collecting divine weapons, and awakening heroic spirits. Assemble a knightly order to battle powerful enemies and uncover the ancient secrets of Eusayard.

name: Multiplayer Mongolians
description: Multiplayer Mongolians - They attacked Your village, They killed Your family. Revenge is a dish best served ... Mongolian! (Multiplayer or Single Player)

name: Roots of Harmony
description: Text-based 4X with a focus on turf war and resource management. Roots of Harmony is an old-school keyboard-controlled casual game where you have to lead your colony to different stages of development, while facing various threats and managing your doctrines and disciples.

name: A Conversation With a Magical Deer
description: Have a conversation with a magical deer.

name: Back to the Rooms
description: Back to the Rooms is a 6-player co-op horror experience. Survive and explore the backrooms with your friends or alone to save your home.

name: HexaTerra
description: Dynamically change the landscape in this hexagon block puzzle game. Strategize to solve complex puzzles with biomes that shift depending on adjacent tiles. Complete the story or play endless levels.

name: Blood=Bullets
description: Blood=Bullets is a bullet hell boss rush action platformer where you dash into bullets to refill ammo. In order to kill the blood itself, one must hack into the sequence.

name: Pogo Knight
description: Bounce your way to the top and claim victory... How hard could it be?

name: BoringFly
description: A turn based casual card game with a storyline that only requires the use of a mouse throughout the game. On the basis of simulating the gameplay of Lianliankan, add combat elements. At the same time, players can choose different talents and adapt to different gameplay expressions.

name: Auto_Battler_RPG
description: This is a game about automatical upgrades and unlocking of resources The game plays by itself while all you do is upgrade your hero... and attempt to move even further in the dungeon and by doing that growing in strength.

name: Desert Mercenary Corps
description: Welcome to Desert Mercenaries, a role-playing adventure game set in the desert. In the vast and barren Monchi Desert, you will form your own team and explore the unknown desert mysteries. Let your team win the respect and recognition of the entire Monchi Desert.

name: Chores in the Night
description: "I want this apartment spotless!" shouts your mom before going to her night shift. Use your cleaning supplies and courage to have the house cleaned before your mom comes back. A first person short story about doing chores and avoiding evil forces to survive the night.

name: Gunz & Golf
description: Gunz & Golf is a single-player, physics-based precision platformer. Master 3 unique guns, blast your ball through outlandish obstacles, and conquer a handcrafted pixel art course by the omnipresent Developer. Prepare for hilarious frustration and satisfying triumphs!

name: Skel Dungeon
description: Skel Dungeon is a real-time strategy defense game. Become a small skeleton and defeat the heroes invading your dungeon. Set up and upgrade trap rooms, expand your dungeon, and strengthen your skeleton to stand against increasingly powerful heroes.

name: Who is Paul
description: Isaac, a failed detective, receives a mysterious letter that leads him to investigate a desolate and abandoned house in order to make ends meet. However, upon arrival, he realizes that instead of investigating, he must survive. To escape this house filled with dark secrets,

name: Smoking Gun
description: Smoking Gun is a single player, western themed, vertical scroller, shoot 'em up arcade game. Step into the boots of an Arizona Ranger and fight for justice as ruthless bandits descend upon Hickstown, convinced the lawmen are behind their gang's mysterious disappearances.

name: The Stone of Wisdom
description: The Stone of Wisdom is a top-down, Zelda-like ARPG, it features action-adventure style gameplay. Players will explore egyptian cities, battling mythical creatures, solving puzzles, collecting special items, and finding secret passages.

name: WiThu, It's Time To Go
description: WiThu, It's Time To Go is an RPG Maker Horror puzzle game. You wake up in a familiar place. Something that everyone has is called a name, but you don't. Searching for who we are and the truth of these things. The adventures in mysterious lands are waiting for you.

name: East Trade Tycoon: Inheritance
description: Eastern Trade Tycoon: Inheritance is a trading simulator game.In the game,you can from zero to hero.By trading markets, build a business,earn money,level up, investing accurately, and manage family to become a trading tycoon!

name: The Carnival Killer
description: Step right up to the most twisted carnival you'll ever encounter! In The Carnival Killer, 4 players find themselves trapped in a nightmarish amusement park where laughter turns to terror. Killer Clowns stalk the grounds, hunting down anyone who fails to escape the nightmare.

name: Pix'Hard
description: "Fight off endless hordes of enemies with your ship! Upgrade it to defeat increasingly powerful opponents! Choose your upgrades carefully, manage your priorities, and find your enemies' weak points!"

name: Recovery Phrase
description: Uncover hidden words, piece together clues, and think beyond the game screen to unravel mysteries. Every challenge pushes the boundaries of your creativity, demanding you to use both in-game elements and real-world insights. Each step brings you closer to decoding the Recovery Phrase.

name: Miner Open Chests
description: It's a relaxing miner style game full of fun. You can use various tools to break barriers or jump onto platforms. Find your way through maze-like levels by solving puzzles and operating machineries to find treasure chests. The pixel mode bring you classic 1990s' game experience.

name: Keep Looking
description: This is a nerve-wracking horror game that puts you in a dark, claustrophobic cave with a relentless creature. Survive by flashing your dying flashlight at the right moments—too soon or too late, and it’s over. You must keep an eye on the creature, but beware: staring too long is just as deadly.

name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
description:
Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands is a promotional browser flash game created to promote the Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands. Playing the game unlocked a costume in the main game, though that feature no longer works. The game is still playable on explosivebarrel.net

The game consists of six short stages. It is an auto runner where prince must dodge traps and attack enemies. On the first stage, Prince only has time rewind power after death. The second stage introduces a boss battle where Prince has free movement. From the third stage onward the bosses can only be damaged by the elemental attacks. The elemental powers are different on each stage. The second stage Prince has also dash power. Third stage swaps the dash for freezing power. Fourth swaps the freeze for fire shield and attack. The fifth stage swaps from fire to earth shield. The final stage is a boss stage where Prince can freely swap between the four powers and only the matching color on the boss' chest damages the boss

name: DuckLaserDuck
description: DLD offers synergies unfettered by balance. Chain lightning proc'ing explosions for exponential chaos. Your brain won't be able to handle the copious amount of Juice. If things get too crazy, it's your fault! :D

name: Laundromat Simulator
description: Furnish, Manage, and Maintain multiple stores in Laundromat Simulator! Collect and Count your hard-earned pennies and improve your stores to keep customers happy and maximize your profits. Expand your business, improve customer experience, and make your laundromat the best in town!

name: Just Squat
description: Just Squat is a shmup and visual Nobel game that focuses on boss fight by growing up a boy. Grow the boy by encountering various events at the gym and school, and push Babel out with all your might! The difficulty of boss fight and the boy's growth will be determined by the exercise you choose!

name: Combat Rover: Operation Storm
description: Fight in a war on Mars as a mercenary. Pilot futuristic combat vehicles. Engage in combined arms operations. Choose your own missions in a dynamic war set in a sandbox campaign. Ally yourself with the native Colonists or become rich by fighting for the Corporations.

name: Rift Drift
description: Rift Drift is a momentum based drifting game, featuring infinite and time trail based game modes in a variety of procedurally generated levels & biomes.

name: Shepherds
description: Shepherds is a 3D, two-player co-op musical adventure game in which players control unlikely partners - a shepherd girl named Zoe and a magic wolf named Kin. Players must cleverly combining their unique mastery of musical melodies and distinctive movement styles to solve puzzles.

name: Kindred
description: In this eerie, horror visual novel, you are confined in a room with a monster. How will you fare against petrifying odds? Will you be able to work your way into the mind of an indecipherable beast, or will you be added to the casualty count? A word of advice: Choose a side; don't look back.

name: Fatebound
description: Fatebound is a turn-based kingdom builder where your choices shape the realm’s destiny. Manage resources, build your kingdom, and adapt to dynamic events and seasons that alter the game's flow. Will your empire rise to greatness, or fall to the whims of fate?

name: Eternal Ninja
description: Eternal Ninja is a 2D platformer with puzzles and traps. Players learn from each death to progress through ingeniously challenging levels. It's a fun yet tough game, designed to test your skills!

name: Project Delta
description: Challenge the tower solo or co-op in this high-octane sky crawler action rogue-lite. Stack power ups and steal destructive weapons as you dodge, dash and mutilate your way to the top. Your retribution awaits.

name: Departed
description: Departed is an anomaly detection game, where you are stuck inside a looping subway system. Explore the station carefully and spot the differences. Nine consecutive correct decisions will bring you closer to your goal. Can you make your way through the endless platforms or will you get lost forever?

name: Alien Video Game Scientist
description: A 3D platformer collectathon featuring puzzles, mazes, and a bit of speedrunning in a retro-minimalist package evocative of the PS2 era. Can YOU figure out how to grab all the things, and do it efficiently? FOR SCIENCE!

name: Madden NFL 25 Mobile Football
description: The newest season of Madden NFL Mobile is here! Build your Ultimate Team of NFL superstars and put your football skills to the test anytime, anywhere.

name: Last Subway
description: Have you ever had such a gaming experience? It’s filled with wild screams, even mocking the developers, yet you find yourself moved to tears at the end. Perhaps this game is one of those! Why? The truth lies at the last subway station.

name: Wild Fire
description: WildFire is a strategic and survival game. Play as the Tribe Leader and Fire Watcher in the wild that is full of strangeness. Make decisions to be sure your tribe runs well, guide your members to do the right job to survive longer and explore the mysterious land.

name: Halley2061
description: This is a space sci-fi survival and building game. You take on the role of a retired astronaut on a top-secret mission to the Halley’s Comet. Resource and time management will be key to your survival. Will you wisely use limited supplies to build your own space base and achieve self-sufficiency?

name: Under The Blue Horizon: Aquarium
description: "Under the blue horizon - Aquarium" is a game for those who want to enjoy watching fish. Observe fish in the sea and in aquariums. Discover more types of special fish. Enjoy it while working, relax, or clear your mind.

name: Astral Pursuit
description: Tear through hordes of otherworldly creatures and defeat their ruler before the universe ends. Travel between planets, gather powerful relics, and shape the galaxy to your whim in this objective-based action rogue-lite.

name: Arcade Manager
description: Build and manage the Arcade of your dreams. Unlock lots of fully animated games, set their jackpots and build prize zones. Start with a humble local arcade and expand into an major arcade entertainment center!

name: Wild Haven
description: Wild Haven is a nature ecosystem builder. You will build the forest and create a thriving ecosystem. Clean up polluted land, strategically place wildlife together, discover more complex plants and animals and rebuild the ecosystem your way!

name: One Turn Kill
description: One Turn Kill is a PvE card game where card drawing and deck control are the keys to victory. Engage in battles limited to a single turn for an exhilarating, suspenseful experience.Join the protagonist in a pixel art wasteland to face off with the strongest of enemies and see what story awaits.

name: Infinite Idle: Online Clicker RPG
description: Hold down the spacebar or left-click and join the action! Upgrade, grow stronger, and progress endlessly. Enjoy infinite fun with your simple yet powerful strategy to reach the top!

name: Delve Diver
description: Fall-down platformer with Auto-generated stages. Obtain items to help your journey - but beware, you should only bring what you can lose.

name: Mosquito Simulator
description: Mosquito simulator is a prank game in the type of simulation and survival.

name: Black Myth: Destiny Man
description: 500 years after the Western Heaven Sutra. The four members of the pilgrimage group have all returned to the west. Those scriptures have also been scattered in various places. Nowadays, despite the absence of saints, demons still run rampant.

name: Forgotten Fables
description: In "Fábulas Porteñas," the subway leaves you at an unknown station, and you must venture in to find a way to get back home. You will solve puzzles and explore while a creature lurks in the shadows.

name: From Hell
description: From Hell is a third-person action survival horror. Explore an ancient manor in the late 1960s, fight ghouls and all kinds of monsters from the mythical underworld. Survive, craft items, solve puzzles and unlock secrets in the hunt for secret of your missing old friend.

name: Jeepney Stories
description: Jeepney Stories is a heartwarming, slice-of-life, funny and chill visual novel about family, chances, getting old and living in the third world.

name: Dungeon Flowy
description: An auto-battle hack-and-slash RPG. Assemble a party of six and combine your favorite jobs to aim for the deepest part of the dungeon. Enhance your stats with passive equipment obtained from treasure chests or alter the probability of skill usage. Create your own unique build!

name: Fairy Card Battlers
description: A DCG with fast-paced strategic battles that conclude in 8 turns. Simple yet deep mind games emerge from card placement and the choice of benefits at the start of each turn. Will you enjoy the fairies' antics in the story, or aim for the top of the rankings in pseudo-multiplayer?

name: The Exit of Nightmare
description: The Exit of Nightmare is a psychological horror game with collection and puzzle elements. You're trapped in nightmare world and your goal is to find your way back to reality.

name: CatTrio
description: A physics puzzle game in which you have to put cats in a pot and match them! Aim for a high score!

name: Keep Your Eyes Open
description: Everyone must blink, and you are no different. Blinking allows you to see and move around, just watch out for the giant monster who appears to hunt you down when you don't keep your eyes open.

name: Hex
description: Dive into unknown dungeons and fight “HEX”. Use many items to survive in the underworld, Hack & slash action RPG to survive in the underworld! Don't wander around, just keep going!

name: Owold
description: Owold is a type of Psychological Horror game. A story that emerged after an event that took place years later when humanity completely placed itself in the multiverse.

name: Meow Cafe
description: Step into Meow Cafe, a charming virtual world where you serve coffee and desserts, rescue stray cats, and help them find loving homes. Inspired by real-life stories from New York City, this game beautifully captures the heartwarming connections between cats and people.

name: Butcherbird
description: 10 years have passed since a swarm of apocalyptic constructs wiped out most of humanity. Among the ashes of old Earth, a small band of survivors now find themselves with little else to do and far too much ammunition.

description: Sin descripción

name: Gratis
description:
A shop has opened, the shopkeep has moved in, and shoppers need assistance. A quick salve, a trifle, salvation. Help them.

This is a short narrative horror-lite game that can be played in about 20-30 minutes with keyboard and mouse. Play multiple times to see all 11 characters!

name: Wall Town Wonders
description: Wall Town Wonders is a mixed reality game that turns your living room into a lively miniature town. Help colorful characters build their world through fun quests and mini-games, unlocking unique buildings and surprises along the way.

description: Classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG. A retro-styled adventure that combines the best elements of old-school role-playing games with modern features of a roguelike.

description: Sin descripción

name: Echo Of The Horizon
description: Echo of the Horizon (EOTH) is an open-world RPG built in Unreal Engine 5, featuring single-player and multiplayer modes. Players can form clans, tackle dungeons, engage in PvP, and embark on epic quests in a vast, immersive universe.

name: Amazing Sonic Scene Creator 2
description: Game Features- 16-bit, advanced, CD, Chaotix, and next-gen maps. Suggest playing in low quality.

name: Touch The Bubbles 4
description:
Pop the bubbles and avoid red traps. It's as simple as it gets. The challenge grows every level. If it is too easy for your taste just keep playing and see.
Classic mode saves your progress but is slightly harder. Arcade mode however is all about the highscore.

name: Cá Trê
description:
Cá Trê means catfish in Vietnamese.

Walk through a dreamscape and experience the horror of catfish.

name: The Dream Of Yourself
description: "The Dream of Yourself" is about the discovery of the “other” in yourself, through a spiritual exploration of your subconsciousness.

name: Daibouken: Yarinaosu
description: Daibouken: Yarinaosu is an Action Adventure RPG where players explore vibrant worlds, solve puzzles, clear dungeons, and battle foes within a mysterious time loop. Join Aurora as she navigates a fate intertwined with gods and time itself.

name: Gossip
description: Gossip is a video game created for Atari 8-bit computers by then-Atari, Inc. employee Chris Crawford. The documentation indicates that Gossip is an Atari Program Exchange title, but it was not listed in any of the published catalogs and may not have been released at all.

name: Queens
description:
Crown each region.

The goal is to have exactly one crown in each row, column, and color region - with no crown touching each other. There is only one right answer, and no guessing is needed.

name: Creature Packets
description:
Creature Packets is a game about cooking tiny creatures. Using a microwave, you can bring creatures from packets to life. Use blender to explore new substance packages to cook even more creatures.

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 56 on the theme "tiny creatures".

name: Dead Ascend
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Light
description: Dark Light is a pixel art platformer adventure inspired by NES games of the 80s and 90s. You play as John, who is awakened from a peaceful sleep when a lightning strike shatters the silence of the night. As he looks out the window, he witnesses terrifying monsters emerging from the darkness. Armed with improvised tools and driven by curiosity, John embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the source of this strange anomaly and face the growing threats.

name: Bricks Survivors
description: Bricks Survivors combine le charme des casse-briques rétro avec l'intensité des roguelites modernes. Survivez à des vagues de briques rapides et affrontez des boss en pixel art, le tout conçu par un seul créateur. Une expérience unique et addictive, disponible exclusivement sur PC.

name: Stealth Syndicate
description: Stay hidden among the crowd and defeat your opponents before getting spotted, or you risk not surviving in this party game where you need to mix stealth, speed, and tactics. Playable locally and online for 2 to 10 players.

name: Changuy: The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Horoboshi Hime
description: Sin descripción

name: Burger Man
description: Burger Man is a straight BurgerTime variant. In each of the one-screen levels the player needs to assemble a certain number of burgers. Each burger consists of four parts which lie on the platforms. The player needs to walk over those parts and then they fall down one level - when they meet another of the parts, it also falls down. A burger is done when all four parts are on the lowest level. The platforms are interconnected with ladders which are also the only way to evade the enemies which walk around the levels (the player character can't jump). Touching an enemy results in death

name: Radio_Wishers
description: A Yume Nikki styled game where you follow three amnesiacs trapped in a strange building. The only way these three can recover their memories are through finding them in their dream worlds, and have to work together in order to escape.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 2nd#
description: Updated version of Project Diva 2nd released alongside Project Diva Extend, came as a download code with the physical release or was added to your account if you bought extend digitally, this version includes the updated features from extend along with some added outfits among other additions and improvements. This version also supposedly has better performance than the original version.

name: Escape Floor 13
description: Escape Floor 13 is a survival-puzzle game with adventure and simulation elements. Set in a mysterious hotel, players are trapped on the 13th floor and must carefully navigate each level to reach safety. The primary goal is to cross each floor and reach the elevator, but supernatural anomalies complicate the journey. If an anomaly is sensed, players must retreat to their starting point to survive. The game’s tense atmosphere is heightened by the ever-present surveillance of the hotel, challenging players to rely on their instincts to escape.

name: Kassei: Road Cycling
description: Kassei: Road Cycling is a summer sports simulation game. To win the yellow jersey you have to manage your team optimally: as "directeur sportif" you decide on training plans as well as race tactics.

name: Dead Pixels
description: Sin descripción

name: Rise of the Half Moon
description: Play a card game against the moon and test your knowledge of the lunar cycle.

name: Cube Zone
description: Cube Zone is an unreleased space shooter by Sega which was set to be released in 1988.

name: Hacky
description: Become an elite hacker in cyberpunk typing simulator. Infiltrate networks, steal data by typing simple commands. Unlocking new abilities as you go deeper. No coding skills needed.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Spirits of Zeon
description:
From the attack on Jaburo to the final stand at A Baoa Qu Spirits of Zeon follows two Principality soldiers, Kurt and Robin, also known as the two Ogres, in their fight to survive. Players shoot their way through eight sequential stages starting in Jaburo, through the escape into space, the defense of Solomon, and lastly to the last outpost of Zeon. At the end of their path lies a duel with the White Devil, and hero of the One Year War, Amuro Ray.

Stages are completed by shooting everything in your path until reaching a boss fight. In addition to the Zaku II's assault rifle the mobile suit is also equipped with a Heat Axe to attack nearby enemies, a high damage limited-ammunition bazooka that can blow apart shielded enemies, and a limited-ammunition mine that hits every enemy onscreen and can be thrown while ducking. Raising the gun vertically ducks, reloading the gun and avoiding marked enemy fire and melee range attacks. Additional health and ammunition are contained a item creates, and bonus points can be gained by shooting difficult to hit targets or completing secret objectives. Some stages also come with optional objectives, such as defending Solomon from a missile barrage or shooting down more targets than Char.

A wide range of rare Federation technology make boss-fight appearances in the game, including a squad of RX-79, the Full Armor 78-1, and the first game appearance of the RGM Striker.

name: Rise of The Newborns
description: In a dystopian world consumed by the VAS, become one of the Newborn: A new generation of humans immune to the plague, surviving the ravages of disease, mutants, and sinister AXIOM. Fight for hope, rise against the odds, and pave the way for society to be reborn in a unique online sandbox RPG.

name: Black Death Interactive
description: Travel back to 14th century Venice during history's deadliest pandemic. This interactive historical narrative puts you in the shoes of Giana, a young baker's daughter, as you face impossible choices in a city gripped by plague.

description:
"Bumping around! Helping each other! Turn your friendships into friend-shapes!"
Dive into a quirky multiplayer co-op puzzle game where adorable, fluffy cube-shaped creatures collaborate to reach their goals.
These creatures, each oddly shaped, jostle against each other to help solve puzzles together.
When in trouble, shout "HELP!" and friends will surely come to your aid. With everyone's strength, turn friendships into friend-shapes!

name: Gravity Strike
description: Physics based action game. Use gravity forces to manipulate dynamic objects to destroy your enemies.

description: This downloadable pack includes four characters with special voices and four pieces of furniture. Penguin Wolf Raccoon Shiba Inu Shaved Ice Machine BBQ Grill Chabudai (low table) Telescope Requires the full version of 'All You Need is Help! - Ready, Set, Puffer Pop!' sold separately.

description:
Emily can’t wait to spend the first night in her recently purchased home, but it may not be as comforting as she hoped. This house still has an occupant, and they’re particularly smitten with the new owner.

Will Emily escape the evil that inhabits her seemingly peaceful new home, or will she get pulled into the darkness?

name: Dreadborne Dungeon
description: Dreadborne Dungeon is a pixel art, retro shooter inspired by old school games like Doom and Heretic, as well as mechanics taken from Souls Like games and dungeon crawlers. Explore dark dungeons, fight enemies and survive in a retro-styled world. Die, draw conclusions and don't give up! Good Luck!

name: Strand
description: Step into the desolate void of a high-tech space station in STRAND. Face mind-bending puzzles to escape an infinite time loop while uncovering the fate of your crew. Every detail matters as you unravel the mystery and question humanity’s role in the vast, unforgiving universe.

name: Angst: A Tale of Survival
description: ANGST is a solo & co-op wilderness survival game set in a freezing, gritty, stylized Low-Poly limbo-like world. Craft tools and weapons, hunt, fish, and fight to stay alive. Upgrade skills to venture deeper into the wild, but be warned: what lurks there can thwart your plans. Survive the ANGST!

name: Kremlin 3D
description:
Vladolf Putler, a psychopathic ruler of an evil empire, is disturbing the global peace again.
He has to be stopped before more lives are lost. Are you up to the task?

name: Placid Plastic Deck: A Quiet Quest
description: A wholesome game where you can’t die. A relaxing and witty adventure featuring colorful pixel-art locations, peculiar characters, quirky dialogues, elements of deck-building card battles, and a lot of ducks. A tale of friendship and revenge!

name: Flare Nuinui Quest
description: Play as Shiranui Flare in this retro action platformer, wielding her dual pistols, as you explore the world on a quest to save your friends!

name: Shop Simulator: Supermarket
description: DESIGN, SELL & EXPAND – YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS. Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today!

name: Project Songbird
description: Project Songbird is a cinematic first-person narrative horror game set in the Appalachian forest. Take on the role of Dakota, a musician who must record their new album in a remote log cabin amidst a writer's block. Take caution, however. These woods were never empty...

name: Behemoth
description: Dodge ‘n flap your wings in this new arcade extravaganza from The Behemoth! Become one with the chicken, secure your flock in the nest, and collect as much candy corn as possible!

name: Shiina Taki's Decameron
description: Shiina Taki's Decameron is a doujin interactive fiction based on anime「BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!」. The story concentrates on Shiina Taki, the drummer and song writer of MyGO!!!!! and her fight against fate till the last breath.

name: Deck of Haunts
description: Deck of Haunts invites you to become a malevolent Haunted House. Lure humans into your cursed halls, manipulate their fears, and drain their essence to grow your power. Use strategy to build your mansion and expand your dark influence, turning your home into a terrifying, inescapable nightmare.

name: Void Scout
description: Save reality one mission at a time! A seemingly unimportant Void Scout gets thrown into the middle of an interdimensional war, as the only one who can prevent the Exoforms from consuming reality. Strategize, plan, and execute in a suspenseful tactical roguelike. Save the multiverse and die trying!

name: Escape from Mutation Station
description: A short, unconventional escape room experience. You are the candidate. You must find a way out of this room. Things are not as they seem.

name: My Last Friday
description: My Last Friday is a first-person horror-adventure game with a disturbing atmosphere, clever puzzles, body horror, and tense combat. Explore a twisted world, confront terrifying enemies, and endure the nightmarish challenges ahead.

name: Egg Run
description: Collect the twig and get to the base of the ladder in as few moves as possible.

name: The Victor Initiative
description: The Victor Initiative is an atmospheric horror game about exploring an abandoned government facility that lost contact with the rest of the world 60 years ago.

name: Satanic
description: Satanic is a first-person survival horror game about escaping a satanic cult. Hunted by a relentless demon that responds to your actions, you must avoid detection, scavenge for resources, and navigate your way through an ex-soviet missile silo deep below the surface.

name: White Knuckle
description: White Knuckle is a first person speed climbing game. Ascend through the guts of SUB-STRUCTURE 17 using precision movement mechanics. Sharp reflexes and resource management will take you to the highest peaks under ten thousand meters of concrete and decay.

name: Deathbound: Accepted by Death
description: Enter the mysterious liminal space between Life and Death a floating rock in the void. In this epic DLC you must release the great essences of the 5 bosses representing five stages of grief – Denial, Anger, Bargaining, Depression and Acceptance – before unlocking Path to Death for the final showdown with Grief – The Purifier – the mightiest of them all.

name: Blind Exposure
description: Navigate through claustrophobic, completely dark world illuminated only by scans you manage to create; listen carefully to sounds coming from the darkness, and don’t let dread and paranoia get to you.

name: Detective Eustaquio
description: Sin descripción

name: Defend Earth: Xenos Survivors
description: You are Earth's last line of defense in a relentless alien invasion. Experience intense top-down roguelite action across diverse landscapes, fighting invaders with a versatile arsenal. Outsmart, outgun, and survive your foes. Every run increases the challenge - so adapt, evolve, dominate!

name: Mircea
description: Mircea is a short spooky adventure game. Explore a subway infested by mysterious, bug-like beings. Investigate and understand the monsters to capture them... before they capture you.

name: Juxtastat
description: Select the geographical region answering the question in a series of 5 questions. The questions get harder as you go on.

name: Vile: Director's Cut
description: A game about misogynistic entitlement. Browse an old computer's files to uncover information about adult film actress Candy Corpse, and her recent departure from the industry.

name: The Adventures of Oddley
description: Action, exploration, and endless surprises await in this all-new nonlinear RPG extravaganza! Roam a vibrant city brimming with secrets, quirky characters, and exciting challenges. Collect rare items, pogo, and chat with the locals—if you feel like it! Or blaze your own trail, ignoring the rules entirely. The choice is yours!

name: Star Ronin
description: Star Ronin is a top-down action-adventure game set in the far future. Your family, indebted to a massive megacorporation, must use all of its skills to survive.

name: Detention

name: Sushi Catapult

name: Mr. Meaty
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Meaty: Night of the Attack of the Flesh Hungry Meat Monsters
description: Sin descripción

name: Burnin' Rubber 6
description: Burnin' Rubber 6 is an intense car-combat racing game where you race, drift, and blast through competitors in explosive battles. Explore the open world and customize your car collection to perfection. Become the ultimate racing mercenary! Includes split-screen multiplayer and a track editor!

name: Mr. Meaty: Treasures of the Deep (Fryer, That Is!)
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Meaty Hangman

name: Relatle
description:
Relatle is a daily music game where, starting from a given music artist, the player must reach a different given artist by selecting artists related to the last one selected. Related artists come from the "Fans Also Like" data pulled from popular music streaming services.

Users can also create custom challenges, designating their own starting and endpoint artists.

name: Miss Perfect Miss Ending
description: Miss Perfect Miss Ending is a detective game where you talk to Pretty, solving puzzles, finding secrets and unlock numerous endings!

name: Empire of the Ants: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Experience Empire of the Ants like never before with the Digital Deluxe Edition. This exclusive package offers players a deeper dive into the world of ants with a 3-day early access, a digital artbook, stunning HD wallpapers, and an immersive soundtrack.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Full Game
- 3-day Early Advanced Access
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Wallpapers

name: PowerWash Simulator: Halloween Seasonal 2024
description: Something filthy this way comes in PowerWash Simulator’s latest Seasonal Special. You’ll have to hose off more than a few cobwebs to take the Halloween House from mortifyingly mucky to party-ready perfection.

name: Basketball Legends 24
description: Build Your Dream Basketball Team. Own Your Legacy.

name: Indie All Star Vol. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Drone Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Ducky Dash
description: Ducky Dash is a tribute to classic handheld games, featuring a charming green monochromatic palette and a retro soundtrack that evokes nostalgia. Embark on an exciting journey with a fearless little duck, using your Dash skills to overcome obstacles and explore vibrant worlds.

name: Train Sim World 5: German Regional Edition

description: Sin descripción

name: Cat in Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Beware Tomorrow
description: You must escape a mysterious facility and solve complex puzzles in this psychological horror game. An unseen entity manipulates both you and a deranged man, forcing you to make life-or-death decisions to survive.

name: My Pirate Husbandos
description:
Having nearly drowned at sea you find yourself an outsider among the handsome pirate crew who rescued you. They sail by day, do depraved things at night, and you can't keep your mind from thinking about them.

Set sail into the sexy and dangerous story of My Pirate Husbandos.

name: Family Feud
description: Sin descripción

name: Eruptle

name: Vampire Survivors: Ode to Castlevania
description: The Vampire Survivors have come a long way in their honorable hunt, and after joining forces with the Belmont Family, they are the closest they've ever been. Finally, within their grasp... A vampire. Possibly, at least.

name: Endless History
