name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison 2
description: A reunion of old middle school friends in a room resembling something from an Alice in Wonderland world. With chains and collars around the girls' necks.

name: Treasure 'n Trio
description: Team up with a brute-force warrior, a nimble and wily thief, and a cowardly wizard with teleportation magic. Use all three characters with different abilities at the right time to solve puzzles and collect treasures.

name: Sausage Cat
description: A short and cozy puzzle game about cats with an innate talent for stretching. Your task is to lead them to the milk pots while filling the room.

name: Robert's Spooktacular Ghost Train
description:
Do you like those fairground ghost trains? Have you ever wanted to create your own?

Now you can!

Robert The Skeleton needs your help with his ghost train!
So build your ride, try it out yourself, open it to the public to collect points and unlock more scares!

Make it SPOOKTACULAR!

name: Dog Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: La Crypte des Maudits
description: The sequel of Black Sect remained confined to France on the Amstrad CPC. Like its predecessor it's a graphical adventure with a text parser, but unlike that game it did not benefit from an official remake, though a fanmade one exists under the name of "Black Sect 2: The Cursed Crypt".

name: Squash Ball
description: Welcome to Squash Ball, the ultimate idle clicker sandbox game with physics, themes, clicking stats, and a leveling system. Perfect for casual gamers and those who love to fidget with items digitally. With its colorful design and addicting gameplay, it's easy to pick up and hard to put down.

name: Let's Build Wonders: Galaxy
description: Let's Build Wonders: Galaxy is a multiplayer cooperative game focused on building space wonders. In the game, players collaborate by trading resources and planning routes, working together to expand their alliance’s galactic territory and form a defensive community to resist pirate attacks.

name: Nuts About Nuts
description: Nuts About Nuts is a “stress free” co-op game where you partner up, pick your tools, and let the factory floor become your playground. Use your skills, to manufacture and deliver complex parts to keep the assembly line moving and your friends in sync.

name: The Basement Ritual
description: The Basement Ritual is a short indie horror game where you have been kidnapped and must escape a cult’s basement premises solving puzzles and hiding from a demonic creature.

name: Metamathema
description: Engage proxy wars as an elite merc on Metamathema, the secret military service platform providing millions of stealth missions. Arm yourself fully to infiltrate the enemy FOB. Complete the mission and survive in a jungle surrounded by enemy troops. Search, eliminate, and gather intel.

name: Back Alley Darts
description: Back Alley Darts is a crowd-play game designed Back Alley Darts Game experience. The aim of the game is try and get a bulls eye or the hiest points going and be the top of the leaderboard. The more points you get the better it is as you will unlock stuff in the game to be able to use in the game

name: Egg Raiders
description: Egg Raiders is a cooperative horror game where four players work together to infiltrate an area teeming with aggressive monsters. You must survive for three days, gather valuable loot, and escape before more monsters come after you. Teamwork and strategy are the keys to success!

name: Hot Rod Mayhem
description: Race against tiny troublemakers across dozens of crazy courses and take on unique and thrilling trials! Ride on single tracks, unleash powerful items against your rivals, or face off in exhilarating challenges to compete for the championships!

name: Aria of Song
description: This is a single player role-playing adventure game, where you need to play as a human and go to a different world to defeat four disaster monster bosses, obtain their disaster core, and ultimately win the game!

name: Paper Puzzle Ⅱ
description: Place all the pieces into the grid, and as long as they don't overlap, you can clear the level. Simple rules but a real challenge. Want to give it a try?

name: Doom: A Very Graphic Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Blue Dungeon
description: Dark Blue Dungeon is an adventure game inspired by D&D-style role-playing games

name: Anime Boys Dating: Sexy Halloween Costumes
description: Discover the fascinating world of Halloween as you embark on a journey to win the heart of the boy of your dreams... on a night filled with mystery, ghosts, and terrifying magic!

name: Comic Store Arcade
description: Run a comic store!

name: Sleeping Beauty: The Kingdom of Lost Dreams
description: Queen Aurora has known many years of peace in her kingdom, but everything has to change when strange nightmares affect the inhabitants of the place.

name: Juuni-ban-me ni Warui Yume no Sachi
description:
Juuni-ban-me ni Warui Yume no Sachi is a 2D action game with hand-drawn characters.
Explore the wonderful world to collect sheep.

name: Rezarlisia Stories
description: “Rezarlisia Stories” is a command battle-style role-playing game now available on Steam! The story is told in a worldview that combines retro dots from the good old days and 3D.

name: Ultra Jet Girl
description: A jetpack action rogue light game in which the main character, Roo, picks up a broken jetpack and heads to a faraway empty island in the sky in search of his mother.

name: Stray Memoria
description: A contemporary juvenile mystery about young boys and girls who grow up confused and troubled, and adults who harbor secrets.

name: Nananana Tamago
description: Suddenly, you found yourself in a strange world. "You must take this egg to the West Tower." The story begins when a large creature who claims to be the king gives you an egg. You must see with your own eyes what happens when you take the egg to the west tower.

name: 0101: Classic Bonus Levels 1
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Classic levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Counter Bonus Levels 1
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Counter levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Pusher Bonus Levels 1
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Pusher levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Pusher Bonus Levels 2
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Pusher levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Classic Bonus Levels 2
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Classic levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: 0101: Counter Bonus Levels 2
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Counter levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.
Idle clicker game with a percentage based math inside. Compound percent is used for all calculations. Slow start, exponential growth and lots of fun!

name: Reburning Meteorite
description: in 'Rekindled Starfall, a solo-crafted RTS+Roguelite+Card game, hire troops, build squads, tackle missions: combat, gathering, deliveries, bosses. Troops auto-battle nearby foesl,use cards for support. Upgrade town facilities and cards through mission rewards, enhancing squad strength."

name: Steel Knight's Armis
description: "Steel Knight's ARMIS" is a roguelike robot game. Lead the rebellion through five chapters, fighting against the Imperial Army and Earth Federation. Customize and upgrade your robot to survive the intense battles ahead.

name: The Land of Fog
description: Game type: turn based strategy action bar mode Rich plot, diverse skills, players play as several mercenaries, use strategies to challenge various levels, gradually unravel the fog of the Mist Continent, and complete their legends

name: Black Inc.: Go to Work
description: Black Inc.: Go to Work is a pixel-style RPG game created using RPG MV, the game has 2 characters and 8 endings, the game is inspired by China's overtime culture, players accumulate energy and work hard to achieve the ultimate game goal.

name: Link Tower
description: This is a 3D multiplayer cartoon-style tower defense game. Players control characters to walk on an island, build towers to protect castles, work together or hinder each other. Players can edit and share levels, and support making and uploading their own cell, building, and monster mods.

name: Dragon Spirits in Fight
description: DragonSpiritsINFight is an idle card-building game, serving as a spin-off to Dragon Spirits: Academy Adventures. It boasts a simple interface resembling a regular program and features practical functions like a Pomodoro timer, making it the perfect way to unwind during work breaks.

name: Maze Escape
description: A maze chase game. A monster is chasing the player, and the player needs to keep running, jump over the guardrail, avoid being caught by the monster, and gradually find the maze exit and escape the maze.

name: Donguri Koen: Jinkou Eisei Head Scissors Whip
description: As an elementary school student, you meet a mysterious woman at the park after school. "It's just a little mini-game," she says. Enjoy playing familiar mini-games with this slightly competitive Onee-san! But why is she always at the park...?

name: Livers Ikusei Card Game
description: This game is a "Deck-Building Liver Development Card Game."You will nurture aspiring livestreamers (Livers) and help them become outstanding Livers.The goal is to earn as many LP (Liver Points) as possible.To achieve this, you'll need to build an optimized deck.

name: Can You Get Off Work on Time?
description: This is an independent role-playing puzzle game. You will play as a worker who is about to get off work at six o'clock, but encounters a series of workplace troubles that prevent you from getting off work on time. Is it really just a luxury to get off work on time?

name: Kyosho
description: Slash or be slashed. Protect yourself from vengeful spirits with the sword you picked up while approaching the mystery hidden in the mansion. A Japanese-style puzzle action and metafiction mystery horror game with an unusual "inventory puzzle" and sword "parry counter" features!

name: Haunting Record: Sins of Lust
description: This is a walking simulator with elements of horror and suspense. You are trapped in an endless corridor, where eerie events keep unfolding, as if something is trying to stop you from escaping...

name: Hope Isle
description: This is a "blessing" game designed to bring you good luck, combining idle mechanics, desktop pets, farming, fishing, and homebuilding. On this island born from your wishes, each adorable spirit will accompany you every day, offering sincere prayers for your heart's desires!

name: Multiverse Loot Hunter: Three Kingdoms
description: This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens his powers and freely passes through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, Wuxia, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle.

name: Cyberkiller2049
description: Cyberkiller 2049 is a platform-action fast-paced game that battles numerous enemies on destructible platforms. Manipulate the character, kill with one hit, sprint, kill enemies. Picking up bats, remote-controlled bombs. Fight enemies with different abilities.

name: Border Jumper
description: "Border Jumper" is a mysterious RogueLike strategy turn RPG game. Inside a wired spaceship, you need to carefully choose the combination of skills and props, explore and uncover all the truths. In this game, you will experience unique gameplay and exciting challenges, bringing endless fun.

name: Cat Drift
description: A cat racing + development game. Here, you can play up to 10+ new and unusual racing game modes (e.g., Snake Cat); Give your cat a funny superpower through a breeding system (e.g. a tail helicopter); Race with a friend's cat and prank it; Get a digital clone of your real-life cat in the game.

name: The Fireseed Treaty
description: The Fireseed Treaty is a sci-fi strategy adventure game, combining turn-based strategy gameplay with deck building, hexagonal grid moves, and survival elements, as well as a variety of randomized events, relic rewards, and hero training to constantly upgrade your strategy.

name: Horoboshi-hime
description: This is a small and concentrated Roguelike RPG. It offers short but crunchy battles and powerful growth. It is a simple adventure that the protagonist alone takes on, but a series of profound choices are continuously pushed upon you.

name: Novels Rogue: Isekai Koshodo to Fuuin no Majo
description: Enjoy the cards and the story with a combination of "deck building" x "JRPG" x "pixel art."

name: Incident Mahjong
description: "Incident Mahjong" is a Mahjong game where you play while keeping an eye out for "incidents" that occur during the game. When you spot an "incident," make the appropriate tile discard decision, and sometimes point out problematic melds or discarded tiles.

name: Disciple
description: As a fledgling ascetic, you need to explore this vast world and collect rare and precious herbs to refine various elixirs.Players need to use their wisdom and skills, and accurately control the movement of the pills during refining according to the location of the pills on the distribution map.

name: Elf Survivor
description: Elf Survivor is a challenging 2D survival action game. Players will struggle to survive in a dangerous world, facing a constant stream of enemies.

name: Strategy Master
description: What Kind of Card Game Is This? This is a fantasy-themed card battle game where players strategically deploy various card skills to capture strongholds and defeat opponents.

name: Smash simulator
description: Is life full of infinite pressure and helplessness, but nowhere to vent Is reality filled with countless injustices and grievances, yet nowhere to confide in Come to this virtual world and release yourself!

name: Colosseum
description: In Colosseum, players become Victor, a wronged general turned gladiator battling for survival in ancient Rome's arenas. Engage in real-time combat, face diverse enemies, and use tactics to uncover secrets. Fight for freedom and reunite with your family!

name: Shinmai Kyoushi
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Tank
description: Multiplayer online catapult game in the style of Warcraft. The game's combat scenarios are rich and varied, and players can use terrain and power-ups to fight and use a variety of unique weapons and skills to defeat their opponents.

name: QR Dead
description: Your phone is the key to solving the mystery. Scan QR codes, they hold hidden clues. Find herbs for the infusion to save your grandfather. But be careful. A fog has engulfed the village, and a monster with a crossbow for a hand roams within. You are only safe at the altar. Why is it chasing you?

name: Juxtagram
description: A logic puzzle game about building pictures out of squares. Using the clues on the side of the grid, you'll need to fill in the puzzle with dark and light squares to reveal the picture hidden within.

name: Eldritch Soul
description: A roguelike deckbuilder about hiding from an unknowable being, called The Hunter. The Hunter aims to destroy anyone with knowledge from the Eldritch Tome, so you must use this knowledge to hide it. Learn the secrets of the universe in the form of cards, then use these cards to banish these secrets from your mind when the hunter approaches.

name: Twelve Sticks
description: Play hide-and-seek with friends online, hide from the monster, or play as a monster and catch other players. Get scared, have fun, collect points, buy upgrades, and most importantly, have fun.

name: Ribbit Rogue
description: Sin descripción

name: Shop Simulator: Pet Shop
description: In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. You and up to three friends can customize your store and take care of all the needs of a pet store.

name: 3D Slime
description: 3D Slime is a fast-paced game that blends Pac-Man's classic munching with an isometric perspective like Gyroscope. Players control Green Slime, an alien forced by the villainous Rodrick to infiltrate Robocity and collect purple pyramids while evading black bowling balls across pseudo-3D levels with irregular patterns, inaccessible spaces, and varying elevations that require luring the balls away to clear paths.

name: Murder Club
description: Sin descripción

name: J.B. Harold no Jikenbo: Murder Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder Club DX
description: Sin descripción

name: J.B. Harold: Murder Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Keiji J.B. Harold no Jikenbo: Murder Club
description: Sin descripción

name: The Garden Gate Pai Sho
description: The Garden Gate is a place to play fan-made Pai Sho, as seen in Avatar: The Last Airbender, as well as other board games.

name: Legacy of the Wizard
description: The NES/Famicom port of Legacy of the Wizard. Play as five members of a family that set out to kill a dragon hidden within a giant maze.

name: Half-Life 2: Survivor
description:
The arcade version of Half Life 2 was released mainly in Japan on June 28, 2006. Survivor runs on the Taito's Type X with a 32" attached monitor running at 1360x768.

On June 18, 2013 the complete Half-life 2: Survivor 2.0 content dump was released, soon after that the game was modified to run on a regular Windows PC by Marphy Black, ben1066, and several other members of Facepunch Studios Forum. The port gives access to the developer console which was disabled in the original arcade version, therefore making multiplayer possible through the use of console commands.

The game requires the screen resolution to be at least 1360x768, as the position of most of the user interface elements was optimized for the arcade machine's resolution and cannot be changed.

name: Your Average Old School Shmup
description: An old school and simple shoot 'em up with an adaptative difficulty.

name: Gladiator
description: This game is based on the same named blockbuster. Choose one of nine characters and fight on the hot sand of Colosseum's arena. All fighters has different abilities and fighting styles. Survive in all combats and get win in the final battle! There are 3 game modes and two-player Bluetooth multiplayer mode too.

name: Garten of Banban 0
description: Explore the origins of the mysterious Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the dark past of the establishment. Try to make some friends. Uncover the truth behind the place, and who you are

name: Fellow Moon
description: In Fellow Moon, players play a former special operations leader who wakes up in a phone room with no memory and no identity. As the plot progresses, a superhuman threat emerges in the city of Nanting.

name: Ice World
description: A blizzard brought a long winter lasting decades, Humanity on the brink of extinction. Survivors had to face ferocious beasts, and the survivors struggled to survive in this frozen world. Take your husky puppy to hunt, mine ice and snow to build a base, and survive in the cold apocalypse.

name: Virmachina
description: After a nightmare, Eli wakes up to find his fiance missing. To follow her trail, he finds himself navigating an uncertain future. A future being hammered out between competing visions while he deals with visions of his own.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.3 - Virtual Revenge
description:
Version 1.3 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Yanagi and Lighter
• New Game Mode: Simulated Battle Trial
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Shadow Generations
description: Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he's known as the Ultimate Life Form! Speed through iconic stages from Shadow's history, discover hidden secrets in an expansive hub world, and unlock new powers to take on Black Doom and save the world.

name: Outpost 16
description: Outpost 16 is a single-player level for HL2:EP2 that has a cinematic, moody tone with custom voice acting, models, scripted sequences and music.

name: MapleStory iTCG
description: Trading card game produced by Wizards of the Coast in partnership with Nexon from their MMO MapleStory. Players battle one another as characters within the game, equipping weapons and armors, using skills, and summoning monsters to win the game.

name: Junkineering
description:
Embark on Junkineering, a turn-based RPG where you craft a robot squad from everyday junk, brought to life by an AI-core brain.
Use a strategic mind, team up, and take risks to win multiplayer PvE battles!

name: Blosics 2
description: Blosics sequel. Bigger, stronger, better!

name: Beer & Plunder
description: Sin descripción

name: Fight the Skeleton Mage from the Crypt!!
description:
Welcome brave Wizard, take your staff and be ready to defeat an old plague who has emerged from the Crypt!

In this sidescroller game all you have to do is defeat the enemy. Easy and simple! The head is the weak spot!

name: Isle of Birds
description: Isle of Birds is a cute and cozy Town Builder about populating an island with, well... birds! Place and merge a diverse array of feathered friends to build colourful and varied high-rise bird houses until your island runs out of space!

name: MindsEye
description: MindsEye is a story-driven, action-adventure thriller, set in a fictional near future Americana.

name: Goofy Soccer
description: According to the author, Goofy Soccer is designed to give you total control on the ball when dribbling, passing and shooting. Having little mastery on the gameplay will give you the feeling that you are a creative play-maker since you can all set the direction, curve, height and power of your passes. Also the game supports ordinary computer assisted mode for beginners. The game is easy to play, but the harder levels can only be beaten with your great skills.

name: ERN
description: Sin descripción

name: Syobon Action: New Something
description: There are millions of Syobon Action Alternate Universes, which are known as "Syobonverses" that are characterized by changing the appearance of the world, although they are the same plot but with few differences and one of them is New Something, the cat Syobonina has to recover her "cocaine in the form of an Artichoke" and thus not be sad, lots of memes and no sense.

name: Wallace & Gromit: Invention Suspension
description: Sin descripción

name: Wallace & Gromit: Top Bun
description: Baker Bob has been murdered! Help Wallace & Gromit bake the products that Baker Bob used to make so that people don't go hungry.

name: Wallace & Gromit's World of Invention: Wallace's Workshop
description: Sin descripción

name: Faceless: Prologue
description:
A little girl is lost after sleeping for too long at the nursery. Can you help her find her way home?

Many dangers await her on her way, the dark creatures are always ready to consume her small spirit. On this journey, she got a question and gave a promise, but could she remember them until the end?

name: Wallace & Gromit: Snow Drift
description: Sin descripción

name: Faceless
description: The story begins after Faceless prologue ends. A girl wakes up and realizes she has lost her face, she hears the door open from behind, what awaits her?

name: Call the Tune
description:
You'll be following Neo, a young idol dissatisfied with her life. After suddenly moving to a new school for one week, she finds herself wrapped up in the school's student council and its (unofficial) idol group.

But all takes an unexpected turn once a simple accident causes our cast to delve deeper into the school's lower floor. During a series of investigations done by the astute Detective Emilia Ruth, your actions will determine the conclusion of the case as well as the story as a whole.

name: TibiaScape
description: 2D MMORPG heavily inspired by classic tibia, with many innovations and improvements adding depth and longevity to it.

name: Sprocket Rocket: Design and Conquer
description: Help Wallace & Gromit collect cogs to fix their ship and fly to the moon! Make the most of your ideas by protecting them with intellectual property rights.

name: Sunny Side Nightmare
description:
Eddie is a clown apprentice that dreams of becoming like his now retired idol.

However the day he thinks he's finally going to debut, the Ringmaster announced that they're closing the fun side of the circus in favor of the scary side, that just the same day, is finally presenting their new show. An open house show where the public can now participate.

Needless to say, Eddie is not happy with the sudden announcement, and has some complaints to voice.

Follow Eddie inside the nightmare that is the open house and help him take his job back... or at least escape alive.

name: Nehan: Kanzenban
description: A horror adventure game made with RPG Maker, with enphashis on cosmic horror and body horror. There are no battles with minor enemies, only event battles. It is more of an adventure-like content, where you explore the ruins with your survival on the line.

name: Nehan 2: Darkness Fantasy
description: The Sequel to Nahen. Whereas the previous version was a direct panic horror where you escape from the mansion, this one has a psychological sense of fear as the strangeness of the surroundings gradually emerges. Its an RPG Maker 2000 game with cosmic horror and body horror elements.

name: Angry Peppa
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirates Outlaws 2: Heritage
description: Pirates Outlaws 2 is a roguelike deckbuilder card game. Collect and fuse cards to evolve, gather relics for outfit bonus and design your own strategy. Become reputed, loot the Sea Masters, challenge giant creatures and triumph the great Arena.

name: Bonded in Darkness
description:
Arnaud just wants to be left alone.

Turned into a vampire against his will long ago, he's nonetheless managed to carve out a largely peaceful existence in an abandoned manor—a peaceful existence routinely interrupted by the vampire hunter Julien, seeking blood for blood.

Over the years, animosity has morphed into a strange sort of respect, and on one stormy night, Arnaud is greeted with a sight he never expected: his mortal enemy Julien, gravely injured on his doorstep.

Will Arnaud take him in, or will he use this opportunity to grasp the peace he's been seeking for years?

name: Sonic Generations
description: A time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.

name: Squidward Tentacles Jigsaw
description:
You can find particular games which storm your brain even in the initial handful of minutes of game play. These games will make the gamer use his brain for the maximum and finally he will likely be a believe tank of this game. Squidward Tentacles Jigsaw is such a puzzle game that is capable to test your patience and Intelligence quotient. The game attributes 4 difficulty levels and you can opt for 1 based on your experience. You will be offered a shattered Squidward image and you will need to arrange the shattered pieces into a totally fledged snap. A timer is equipped to monitor your moves and this adds the thrill with the game. As a gamer, you’ll need to fight with time as well as your brain to turn out to be a successful puzzle solver. It is possible to use your left mouse button to play this intriguing game. The photographs used in this game are cool and also the sound effects are fantastic.

Use your mouse to play this game

name: Squidward Tractor
description: Squidward is asked by Mr Crab to clean up trashes around the krusty krab and bring them to city dump.

name: All New Ultimate Pub Quiz 2008
description: A quiz game about general knowledge. The players select one of three difficulty settings and three game lengths, three, six of nine rounds.

name: Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance: We are Legion
description:
We Are Legion is the first DLC for Terminator: Dark Fate - Defiance, a gritty real-time strategy game set in the intense universe of Terminator: Dark Fate.

It plunges players back into the heart of the conflict as they take command of Legion, the relentless machine army fighting to dominate a shattered world. This DLC expands on the story, focusing on Legion’s mission to eradicate human resistance and assert dominance over a world ravaged by war.

name: Talksport Interactive Quiz
description: Quiz game for 1 player or 2 teams. The game has 4 different shows which acts as the players' group of questions as a level, each level requires more correct answers.

name: Satoru Gojo Backshot Simulator
description: Gojo sensei is on a mission to become the strongest sorcerer in history. Press the buttons to give people backshots and don't run out of cursed energy. Try and get a mad high score.

name: Space Raiders
description: Embark on an intergalactic journey in this adrenaline-pumping 2D space shooter! Pilot your sleek spacecraft through treacherous enemy armadas as you battle to save the galaxy from imminent destruction. With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, blast your way through wave after wave of alien invaders. Dodge incoming fire, shoot enemies in this thrilling arcade-style adventure. Are you ready to become the hero the universe desperately needs?

name: Sonic In Mario's Mind
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Face Off
description: "Face Off" is a sports game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1988. This is an ice hockey game played using the left and right sticks and the shoot button. Choose your favorite team from 8 types and win the tournament.

name: Cursed Conundrum
description: In Cursed Conundrum, you are immersed in a 2D pixel-art world, where you can interact with objects and solve puzzles using only your mouse. You will need to investigate objects, decipher clues, and exorcise cursed items, experiencing a mix of intrigue and discovery as you try to uncover the truth behind your master teacher’s disappearance.

name: Portrait of a Ghost
description: A "spirit photographer" learns that ghosts are far more real than he thought.

name: Actorle
description: Guess today's featured actor based on their movies. Each time you guess an actor who starred in one of the movies, that movie's title will be revealed.

name: Madness Ambulation
description: Help Sandford and Deimos ride out to save Hank in this following-cam third person chase shooter! Survive all 10 waves if you've got the stomach for it, but be warned...this game will never end. All you can do is survive the Madness for as long as you can grip that wheel for dear life.

name: Dragon Tales
description: Sin descripción

name: Drunk Fred in the Cell
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Clean Ocean
description: In Cat Cleans Ocean, play as a cat in an astronaut suit on a serene mission to clean a polluted ocean. Explore six unique regions, using tools like the Trash Magnet and Doddy the Drone to collect trash and upgrade your equipment. Relax, strategize, and restore the ocean’s beauty.

name: Innkeeper VR
description:
Your Medieval Tavern Awaits!

Step into the shoes of a medieval tavern keeper in a bustling fantasy world! In Innkeeper VR, you control every detail of your tavern, from cooking to cleaning, serving to managing unruly guests.

name: Radical Aces
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - Flame's Story
description: Flame's Story — a hardcore story mod for GTA: SA with 100 hours of gameplay, where you'll be in the shoes of a man who's always out of money, many debts, but a great appetite for food!

name: HackHub
description: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in Hackhub. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

name: Super Mano Bros: Jungle World
description:
Mano has been searching through the jungle ever since his love was captured by the dragon boss. Now he has found a clue as to the location of the castle where the boss resides. However there are many enemies standing in between Mano and his love, Princess Pineapple. And YOUR task is to help Mano overcome these difficulties and reunite them!

Enjoy this journey with Mano and dive into the ten carefully designed worlds! Forest, beach, jungle, tundra, desert, dungeon, castle etc. Endless levels with endless enemies waiting for you to conquer!

name: Coffee Express
description: Open your own coffee shop and become a barista in the cozy and colorful world of Coffee Express! A unique experience awaits you with stock tracking, realistic coffee making experience and shop customizations. Make your customers happy by making excellent coffee in your own coffee paradise!

name: Pizza Rush Race: Fighting Boss
description:
Pizza boss - Peppino is very angry, rushing to fight with Tomato but encountering a maze of trouble, are you smart enough to solve this situation?

In the Pizza Town Race, you need to help Pepperman, Peppino... find Tomata of the same color in the shortest time, before the Pizza boss's anger erupts. Challenges, obstacles, obstacles will constantly appear to challenge your imagination and puzzle ability.

name: Pizza Tower: Idle Tycoon
description:
Pizza Tower is an exciting simulation game! In Pizza Tower, you can make pizzas, sell them, and earn money to build the pizza tower with new floors. You can also attract customers by offering other foods such as cola, nuggets, and french fries.

Have fun with Pizza Tower and work to build the tallest tower!

name: Scary Evil Horror
description:
Find the key while escaping the evil grandpa sponge candyman bob. The scary granny candyman sponge is your granny bad neighbor. He is an aswang zombie and he will never let you out of the haunted scary house!

You need to escape from this evil house haunted by a scary sponge. To succeed in this scary house escape game, you have to find the key hidden in the house by solving puzzles. Solve the mystery of the pennywise zombie clown!

The bob grandpa sponge neighbor is very hungry and this horror will scare you ! He is your evil neighbor. He can also be quite funny at some times . He is looking like a zombie sponge or a scary green grandpa alien!

You will spend scary nights trying to escape the evil bob granpa neighbor in this frightening 3am nightmare mansion. If you escape the house you will have to find your way through the aswang haunted forest, but the funny sponge grandpa will still be scaring you. There is a lot of paranormal activity in the forest and the haunted house.

name: The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal
description: For a long time no one claimed the Gray Cowl of Nocturnal. The last one was the Champion of Cyrodiil at the ending days of the Third Era. But what happened after the Oblivion Crisis? Where is the Gray Cowl now? You're a thief and during stealing and pickpocketing items around the world, a vision appears in front of you. The Gray Cowl is calling. The big journey has started... Where will you go now? Many places are awaiting you. Legendary places, mysterious places, ancient places that needs to be cleaned up from the sands of time. The Gray Cowl wants you.

name: Rethawed
description:
Breathe new life into Tony Hawk's American Wasteland on PC with reTHAWed, a comprehensive mod that injects the game with a massive dose of fresh content and long-awaited fixes.

Shred with a legendary roster of skaters, including those previously cut from the game or those that hail from other Tony Hawk's Pro Skater titles.

reTHAWed doesn't just expand your skater selection, it lets you customize them further than ever with a wealth of new clothing, hats, and deck options.

Experience classic levels from across the Tony Hawk's franchise all while battling
your friends online thanks to the mods restored and improved multiplayer functionality.

On top of that, reTHAWed tackles lingering bugs in the original game, introduces a custom launcher for ease of use, and even throws in widescreen support and adjustable physics for a fine-tuned skateboarding experience.

With frequent updates adding even more content, reTHAWed is the ultimate way to revisit and revitalize Tony Hawk's American Wasteland.

name: Pippa Funnell 4: Secrets of the Ranch
description: Sin descripción

name: Afterlight Catacombs
description: Afterlight Catacombs is a horror exploration game in which you attempt to escape a procedurally-generated labyrinth while a mysterious stalker chases you in the dark. Explore the winding tunnels, learn the secret about this dungeon and, above all, do not let your torch run out!

name: Distressed
description: 5 Player Co-Op horror investigation game.

name: Out Of Memories
description:
A surreal, minimalist spooky ride through impossible geometry, deadly traps and caustic commentary from the observers of the player's attempt to stay alive for just a little longer, as a toxin kills them little by little.

The game has text graphics and uses the character set from the original PC from 1981. It's presented as if running on that hardware, on a green phosphor monitor - with just a hint of red.

name: Hydlide
description: NES/Famicom port of Hydlide. An evil demon named Varalys casts a curse upon the princess Ann, turning her into three fairies. You control Sir Jim and set out to find the fairies, and then slay Varalys. Only by vanquishing Varalys can the curse be lifted. Once the princess is restored the kingdom will be saved. The fighting is a little more in-depth than hack and slash. You can either fight with a defensive or offensive stance, or you can use magic spells.

name: Fulfillment Center Simulator
description:
Starting in a basic shipping container, you have been left a small list of suppliers and customers from your late uncle to carry on his legacy.

Kind of a cheap legacy, the guy couldn't even afford more than a shipping container. Anyway, build your way up from there, earning renown with both customers and suppliers! The more you buy and ship, the more you CAN...buy and ship! Supply the whole world with Fulfillment Center Simulator!

name: Water Level / B.l.u.e. Exploration
description: Sin descripción

name: Gardenscapes
description: Create the perfect garden! Comb the rooms of a gorgeous mansion for hidden items and restore a once stunning garden to its former glory. Choose from tons of garden accessories to customize the garden to your taste. Become part of the city’s community and compete in the “Best Garden” contest. No worries if you are a garden design novice - an amusing and witty butler, Austin, will always be of assistance. Become an outdoor décor pro in this cutting hedge game!

name: Arcade Archives: Metamorphic Force
description:
"METAMORPHIC FORCE" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1993.
Four young heroes arise as heirs to the goddess and divine beasts that once fought the dark lord to end his evil reign.
Transform into a beast and use your powers in battle. Unleash your wild side and destroy the enemy forces!

name: Fred the Movie: Figglehorn Fling
description: Sin descripción

name: Talking Pierre the Parrot
description: Talking Pierre is in the house! Are you ready for some amazing guitar shredding? Pierre now rocks Smoke on the Water, help him bend the strings!

name: Napobination
description: An action-rpg set in Naples, save the city from the local mafia who created an army of gigant crabs, use your skills to save your friends and fight bosses!

name: PC Basket 4.0
description:
This is the fourth installment of the "PC Basket" saga of Dinamic Multimedia. Like its predecessors, PC Basket 4.0 combines a team database with a basketball simulator, and allows the player to browse the updated player database to play a basketball manager / coach simulation of any of the teams or Just play a game.

Apart from the updated database, this fourth game in the series offered a graphic resolution of 800x600 in the simulator, 32 new teams and the possibility of playing the European League. Also, in simulation mode, the referees were visible and it was possible to make new moves, such as passing the ball to players behind you.

name: Olivers äventyr: Drakens förbannelse
description: Olivers äventyr: Drakens förbannelse is an adventure game set in a fantasy world where you play as Oliver. The dragon has awaken once again and the princess has gone missing, it is up to Oliver to rescue the princess and put the dragon back to sleep.

name: Jönssonligan: Jakten på Mjölner
description: Jönssonligan: Jakten på Mjölner is a puzzle-solving point-and-click adventure game based on the Swedish comedy films which uses the same characters but a new plot.

name: Jönssonligan: Går på djupet
description: Jönssonligan: Går på Djupet is a puzzle-solving point-and-click adventure game based on the Swedish comedic films which uses the same characters but a new plot

name: Foot Step
description: Foot Step is a game in which you need to control a little man and dodge kicks. When it comes into contact with cells, the foot will destroy them underneath it, but if the foot collides with a round object, the foot will not be able to break through it and will stop on this line, turning the round object into a regular cell. The goal of the game is to advance gradually without getting kicked or falling onto the spikes below.

name: Ring Fit Adventure: Rhythm Game
description: This update adds the Rhythm Game, a new mode which allows the player to exercise to music from the game as well as music from other Nintendo games, such as Super Mario Odyssey, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Splatoon 2, and Wii Fit. The update also adds a female and multiple language voice options for Ring.

name: Lord of doors
description: A quirky, emotional and tragic tale of love with cosmic horror. Created by Studio Lemi.

name: Cross Edge Dash
description: An Xbox 360 version titled "Cross Edge Dash" was released in Japan on October 1, 2009.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Octodad - Dadliest Catch Costume
description: Dress Sackboy up as Octodad, the dapper octopus trying to keep his true identity a secret from his suspicious family while living in the human world.

name: Wrong Door
description: This is an abstract, chaotic and meaningless world. A man embarks on a strange adventure in pursuit of absolute power and truth. He becomes the protagonist in the story, a player. In this world, anything is possible. Many things have no explanations. Just accept the present and solve the problems. In this confusing and difficult journey, perhaps something can be understood until the end, or maybe there is still no knowledge or gain, and all the efforts end up in vain. But in any case, one cannot stop here. The road will keep extending. Keep moving forward and fighting. No matter what lies ahead, there is no fear.

name: Harbingers of Desspair
description:
You have died, and those aren't the pearly gates before you...
Your soul has traveled through a wormhole and ended up on the remains of a library on the remnants of a once thriving moon...you hear a mystical voice in your mind directing you to talk to a skeleton a short distance ahead...

After some 'training' the skeleton has you follow him to a magical rostrum where you can select a new body for your soul to inhabit...
You are presented with 32 different bodies and the ability to possess an instance of Desspair himself or one of his trusted Guild Officers before traveling back in time to try and help stop the wormhole from causing the devastation and your interesting predicament...

Embark on an epic adventure as you Explore, Quest, & Survive in the 1st batch of 14 wonderous zones...

With the setting of a Jupiter sized planet with 3 earth sized moons along with a couple pocket dimensions for good measure, good times & numerous memorable adventures are bound to be had...

name: Choplifter
description: Fly a helicopter on missions to rescue P.O.W.s. Four different levels featuring desert, sea, caves and city rescue. Avoid and shoot enemy jets, ships, tanks anti-aircraft fire. Digitized speech and catchy background music.

name: UFO-Man
description: Control the UFO. Carry the Luggage. DON'T DROP IT. – A simple yet challenging foddian game for aliens.

name: Harry's Legend
description: Harry's Legend is a modification of Titenic based on Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (most likely the novel, as the movie came out in 2001) made by Hummer Technology, a successor of Hummer Team. Two versions of the game were originally released with title screens in English and Chinese. Harry's Legend has become an object of multiple unofficial re-releases, appearing on both multicarts and single game cartridges.

name: Settlers of Catan
description:
Settlers of Catan is a turn-based strategy fangame for MS-DOS based on the boardgame of the same name.

Settlers of Catan game description
The object of the game is to be the first player to gain the specified number of victory points during your turn. If you somehow manage to gain the appropriate number of points during an opponent’s turn, you must wait until the end of your next turn before you can win the game (assuming no one else manages to win before then). The number of victory points required to win depends on the scenario being played. the game constantly displays the number of victory points you currently have, as well as the number that you need to win. You gain victory points in five ways: building settlements, upgrading settlements to cities, deploying the largest army, building the longest trade route, and gaining victory point cards. Settlements built in a region where you did not begin with a settlement gain an extra victory point.

name: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures
description: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures is a mobile game port of Prince of Persia developed by Gameloft. The game was first released in September 2002 in a monochrome version on Siemens C55. The initial version lacked a combat system. The game was re-released in color, and with combat on several other mobile devices. Later versions also featured a music in the menu.

name: Power Soccer
description: Power Soccer, also known as Power Challenge and PS, was a massively multiplayer online browser-based sports game, developed by the Swedish developer Power Challenge, the same company that develops ManagerZone (but PS focuses in the sports gameplay instead of management simulation). This game was a browser-based soccer simulator in which users could create a team and play against other users from all around the globe. Additional benefits were offered to those that purchased the Club Membership.

name: Age Of Heroes: Army Of Darkness
description: Age of Heroes: Army of Darkness - is strategy-rpg from Qplaze, the first of the series describing events in the world of Age of Heroes. The menace of underground darkness threatened the world of people. Dead rise from their graves to clear lands from living beings, somebody’s evil will and eternal hunger lead them, and you must save mankind from creatures of darkness.

name: Jill O' Lantern
description:
A slasher satire visual novel where the Final Girl, Vivian Finala, teams up with the monster, Jack Headed Jill, to find out who really killed everyone on Lake Shish Kabob.

Make choices, investigate crime scenes, and meet a cast of queer and colorful characters!

name: Steins;Gate Re:Boot
description: A remake of the original Steins;Gate visual novel to be released in 2025 with new graphics as well as additional story content.

name: Age of Heroes II: Underground Horror
description: Strategy-RPG developed by Qplaze and published by RME for mobile phone, which released in 2006. It is a second game in Age of Heroes series.

name: Bananounce
description: Idle game with banana bouncing everywhere!

name: Anomaly President
description: Sin descripción

name: PSN Protector
description: As you might have heard millions of data was stolen from the PlayStation servers. Can you protect the server from further damage? Good luck!

name: Michael Jackson: Baby Drop
description: Sin descripción

name: VinylMinty's Video Game Quiz
description: From sound effects and places to textual questions, multiple choice, naming characters based on images or voices, and many, many more, dive in with a deep mix of game tests besides music. Bring all that you love about gaming into one truly immersive experience, and it's interactive with Twitch chat to let your audience join in and help-or challenge-you along the way.

name: Fat Albert
description: Sin descripción

name: Find This Pixel Anomaly
description:
In Find This Pixel Anomaly your task involves monitoring real-time surveillance camera feeds. Identify any irregularities within the monitored areas. These anomalies can vary from missing furniture to cute visitors.

Found an anomaly? File a report and hope it will get fixed in time. Otherwise you will get in trouble, because too many anomalies will end the game.

name: Keyboard Crush
description: 2D action game where every click determines your survival! Enemy shapes - squares, circles and triangles - drop down from above and it's your job to destroy them before they overwhelm you. Each enemy has its own specific characteristics that force you to be ever vigilant and quick.

name: Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Hololive Fantasitchi
description: The Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Hololive Fantasitchi (Tamagotchi Nano Colorful ホロライブファンタジっち) is the second release in the Tamagotchi Nano Colorful line. It is made in collaboration with the 3rd generation of VTubers under Hololive Production, named Hololive Fantasy.

name: International Soccer
description:
International Soccer is a soccer game in which two teams play against each other. The match itself can be varied with many settings, e.g. difficulty level, weather, half-time length or time of day, but there are no additional playing modes like a league to be found. However, the basic tactical approach can be set before starting the match.

When not in ball possession, the active athlete can be switched by pressing a button and the opponent can be tackled. The strength of a kick depends on how long the fire button is pressed.

name: Dr. Rabbit's Toothpaste Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: El Lacasito de Gandalf
description: Sin descripción

name: El Brujo
description: Sin descripción

name: Quest for Camelot: Dragon Games
description: Quest For Camelot Dragon Games is a video game published in 1998 on Windows by Knowledge Adventure, Inc., Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment Inc.. It's an action and strategy game, set in a licensed title, mini-games and medieval themes, and was also released on Mac.

name: Alvin's Chipmunk Nut Goody Bars
description: Sin descripción

name: Pour Quelques Bonbons...
description:
Play as a little child in the mysterious village of Enserine.
Collect as many candies as you can and fill your candy book before the other children and win the race !

name: Wallace & Gromit Adventures
description: Meet Wallace and Gromit! Mind-blowing adventures are waiting for you in Wallace and Gromit Adventures. Help Wallace complete the levels, collecting various objects and schemes for building crazy cars. The game has more than 10 worlds and 3 bosses.

name: Köy
description: Sin descripción

name: Nymphomaniac: Sex Addict
description: A visually stunning story about a nymphomaniac who loves her body, sex and adrenaline. All this presented in a photorealistic audiovisual setting.

name: A Tale of Little Berry Forest 2: Stars
description:
A Tale of Little Berry Forest is back

There is a cafe and a village in the forest
Greet customers in the cafe and serve delicious dishes

And what story will unfold in the forest this time?
A warm and exciting story comes to you

There are also many new ingredients
Over 100 new foods are also available

Buy decorations for your cafe
Serve delicious teas and bread for your guests
Find the favorite dishes of the forest residents

A pretty cafe made of wood among the green forest
And fantastic story will make you happy

name: Sudoku
description: A sudoku game developed and published by Hudson Soft for the PSP.

name: Is it okay for me to live
description:
A strange little Windows 98 style game about life, made for the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2024.

Based on some dreams and strange trips, combined into something more akin to an experience versus a traditional story. Heavy inspirations from Tsui no Sora and its peers.

name: Ero Condo
description: Ero Condo is an adult mobile game by Kienbiu. It contains sexual graphics and homosexual stories. As a Condo manager, you will have a chance to meet and talk to all the residents in Ero Condo. To play this game, you will repeatedly tap on your screen to gain experience points and receive "Heart" to upgrade the furniture, unlock new stories, CGs and of course, their lewds.

name: Death to Venice
description:
Take part in a collective rite of putrefaction.

In a wounded world, you're dying. Venice - frail, alien, abandoned - welcomes you in your last moments.

Experience memories of death in Venice's past through six game poems across the city's sestiere districts: a death of biodiversity, a death of institutions, of community... then ponder your feelings on endings and change, talk it out with the city herself. It's all either of you has left.

Venice and its lagoon are dying. This game is for them, and for the Venetians who resist.

name: Crash / Impact / Contact
description: A stone falls into a desert and is surrounded by life. Understanding comes with effort, at a cost.

name: The Legend of Goose: The Honk Waker
description: The Goose is Loose and ready to honk and spread chaos across Hyrule!

name: SM64 Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: HamuHamu
description: A game in which you play as a hamster "Hamuhamu♪" and explore the continent of Hamrica.Meet strange people and say unreasonable things, and the story takes a strange turn.Overcome many difficulties and restore peace to the continent. Please, is it fun? full of mini games

name: Kodokuhime
description:
Himiko's been a wallflower her whole life- so plain and quiet that even the spirits around her never take an interest. But a chance encounter on her way to school might just be the thing to thrust her into the forefront of her very own story.

With black-and-white styling and comic-inspired presentation, Kodukuhime aims to emulate the feeling of a classic shonen manga- full of humor, action, and drama. Framed as the "first chapter" of what would go on to be a weekly series, it can be played through in a single 20-30 minute session.

name: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete
description: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete is the offline successor to Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp, developed to provide a full, standalone experience. This version retains the core gameplay features of designing your own campsite and talking to villagers, while offering an accessible way for players to experience the game after the original Pocket Camp's End-of-Life.

name: Seven Seas: Adventures
description: Welcome to the Seven Seas: Adventures! Set sail and chart your course to fame, fortune, and adventure in this unique age of sail sandbox game!

name: El Dios de Nauru
description: Sin descripción

name: Drosera: Lady Bad End no Hatsukoi
description: Sin descripción

name: Her Deliverance
description:
A woman ventures to a church amid a storm to see if she can't get some help with some... eerie visions and feelings. Haunted by them, she seeks salvation in any way she can.

Is this really a curse? And if so... can she overcome it, in the end?

name: Hit Justin Bieber
description: Sin descripción

name: Survive the KSI Song
description: KSI will chase you while blasting his new song, and your only hope is to find the mute button to escape. (Disclaimer: THIS GAME IS A MEME!)

name: Dreamworks Dragons: Wild Skies
description: Think you've got what it takes to be a rider of Berk? Put your skills to the test and blaze your own path as a dragon trainer. Explore the island, train wild dragons, and take flight in awesome aerial challenges! Ride the dragons you love from the movies: Gronckle, Deadly Nadder, Monstrous Nightmare, Hideous Zippleback, and Night Fury! Plus, watch for new dragon species from the series. Every time a new dragon appears in the show, you'll be able to train it in the game!

name: Hazel & The Deep
description: A Doxy certified classic returns! This original web game is now remastered in a new engine, fully voiced and animated to shine through its sexy glory!

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 1
description:
Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 1 - Sanatorium

- Completely New Slenderman Experience on Android and PC!
- You have to collect 8 pages, but this time you have a GUN !!!
- Shoot Slenderman and Escape the Horror.
- Great 3D Graphics
- Change Level of Details to fit your device ( phone or tablet )!

This game is not like any other Slenderman you've played.

name: This is a Black Parallelepipedon in a Yellow Field
description:
The enigma of the fields. Unknow a shape.

Consider the idea of a black storehouse in a yellow field. Charred walls. Painted walls. Walls smudged in black ash.
Maybe consider an unreal crop.
Or consider, observe, establish, evaluate an above-ground pool. Which would be an odd find, right here in the middle of a field, but then again, that structure in the middle distance has got to be something...

An absurd, alienating game developed as part of the Briefs series, a gold extra project with additional support by Strange Scaffold.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 2
description:
Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 2 - DEAD SPACE

- New Slenderman Chapter For PC
- You have to collect 13 Energy Cells, but this time you have more guns !!!
- Rusty Bars Can Be Shot With A Weapon
- You Can Jump And Crouch! ( Trust Me You're Gonna Need It )
- Shoot Slenderman and Escape the Horror.
- Great 3D Graphics
- New Slenderman Model!
- Great KILL Animation!
- Slender Man Free Full Version

This game is not like any other Slenderman you've played.

name: El Engaño de Barbapoca: Capítulo 1 - Esta Pizza Está de Muerte
description: Sin descripción

name: Apple Climbers
description:
Apple Climbers is a hand based locomotion game featuring the wonderful fruit, apples!

It's a simple game, but with a big twist! Instead of moving normally with your thumbstick, you have to move with your controllers!

name: El Engaño de Barbapoca: Capítulo 2 - Competencia Fantasmal
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Monjusen: Bubbling Imaginary Treasures
description:
Touhou Monjusen ~ Bubbling Imaginary Treasures is a vertical danmaku shooting fangame developed and published by Gore, who had previously released Frantically Forbidden Fruit and Re.Phantasmagoria of Imagine Breaker.

The gameplay derives elements from several official Touhou games, such as Double Dealing Character, Wily Beast and Weakest Creature, Hidden Star in Four Seasons, and Subterranean Animism. The game features five playable characters with three partners each. Your player's weaponry depends on the partner chosen at the player select screen.

The main game mechanic is the Assist Spirit Strike system. By collecting coin items dropped by defeated enemies, you fill up a gauge at the bottom of the screen. Once you have enough money, you can spend some of these coins by pressing C to activate an Assist Spirit Strike, the exact kind varying widely depending on your player character.

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 3
description: Slenderman Must Die: Silent Forest is the third episode of the Slenderman Must Die series from Poison Games.

name: Secret Puzzle Society
description: Help your friend Brooke in a mysterious investigation as she tries to expose the Secret Puzzle Society behind the masks. Beat puzzles, master mini-games, and conquer match-3 levels to uncover clues.

name: One Map
description: Sin descripción

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 4
description: Slenderman Must Die: Silent Streets is an intense and chilling first person shooter game with horror elements.

name: Keyspace
description: Place keys into each level to help you get from point A to point B.

name: Smoke Masks
description: A poem about fire season, with a virtual environment to explore while reading it.

name: Crust Shump
description: CRUST PUNK SHOOT 'EM UP. BLAST BEAT BULLET HELL. HARDCORE ANARCHO ARCADE ACTION. BRUTAL, BLEAK, SHORT AND INTENSE. NO SCORE, NO LEADERBOARDS, NO GODS, NO MASTERS. CAVE MEETS NAPALM DEATH.

name: Plutonium: Kilimanjaro Oddysey
description: This was originally meant to be “Plutonia 11” in reference to another Plutonia jokewad but ended up being a decent wad that mixes variety of quality in mapping (experienced and new mappers in the Project) with some humour BUT IT IS NOT A JOKEWAD.

name: Amatsuki Mahjong
description: Amatsuki Mahjong is a ACG style mahjong game that offers real-time multiplayer online matches. It features four styles of mahjong: Japanese, Sichuan, Taiwanese, and Hong Kong Mahjong. Enjoy a variety of play styles tailored to your preferences.

name: The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker 2
description: An FMV game where YOU are a psychiatrist trying to solve a double murder whilst treating the unusual patients of the recently deceased Doctor Dekker. Ask questions and link answers to determine their fates, and your own!

name: Ultimate Survivors
description: Ultimate Survivors is a fast-paced strategy game with innovative tower defense and tower offense mechanics. Enter the chaotic world wrecked by a nuclear apocalypse, where the wacky arena battles are the only means of entertainment and excitement for the surviving rabble. Build your team of four extraordinary heroes, each with unique powers and abilities, jump into the arena to challenge players from all around the world, and become the Ultimate Survivor!

name: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition
description:
The year is 2054. Earth has been destroyed by an intergalactic war between two alien races, and humanity is on the brink of annihilation. A small number of survivors, aboard the USS White Whale, crash land on the vast and untamed planet Mira—and now it falls to you, as a member of BLADE, to help bring humanity back from the edge of extinction…with the aid of powerful giant robots called Skells!

The visually enhanced edition of this open-world RPG contains newly added story elements and more.

Take on tough foes in a robust combat system, and pilot powerful giant robots called Skells

Choose from a huge variety of special attacks, skills, and classes in a combat system that’s as deep as you want it to be. Once you’ve proven yourself to BLADE, you’ll earn the right to pilot and personalize your very own Skell—a powerful machine that can fly, transform into a vehicle for fast overland travel, and wield immense strength in combat with customizable weapons and armor.

Gather resources and take on missions to build the community of New Los Angeles

As you go about the reconstruction effort, getting to know the people of New Los Angeles (NLA), you’ll build affinity with your party members and unlock quests for gear and other rewards. Join your choice of military organization within BLADE to take on even more missions—or even team up with up to 32 players from near and far online* in Squad Tasks, Online Missions, and extra-challenging Global Nemesis Battles!

name: Slenderman Must Die: Chapter 5
description: Slenderman Must Die: Underground Bunker is the fifth episode of the Slenderman Must Die series from Poison Games.

name: Mad Void
description: Mad Void is a chaotic space survival online co-op, you face alone or up to 3 crewmates alarming dangers on each mission. Sent out by the Galactic Confederation to extract lost tech from fallen spaceship that succumbed in epic space battle, find your way in the mad void of space to retrieve the tech before the Enemy returns.

name: Animal Use Protocol
description: In this first-person, narrative-focused survival horror, you play as Penn, a hyper-intelligent chimpanzee. Hunted at every turn, your only chance of survival lies in scavenging, crafting, and exploring Anchorage Station. An epic story awaits. Be quick and quiet. Time is running out...
